synthesis_conditions.note: Partial removal of the guest molecules from the pores to produce partially evacuated material.

synthesis_conditions.material_used: partially evacuated material 1·(DMF)0.4 (40 mg, 0.17 mmol of zinc atoms)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: flushed with hexane (1 mL), extracted with methanol (2 K 5 mL)
synthesis_conditions.analysis_method: enantiomeric excess measured by 1H NMR spectroscopy with Eu(hfc)3 in CCl4

chemicals_used: oxidant (UHP or H2O2, 1–3 equiv to the sulfide)
synthesis_conditions.material_used: partially evacuated material 1·(DMF)0.4 (0.004 to 0.1 mmol zinc atoms)
synthesis_conditions.analysis_method: composition of the reaction products and the enantiomeric excess measured by 1H NMR spectroscopy with Eu(hfc)3 in CCl4
